website_summaries.verdict: A durable equivalent of many commercial-grade gym trampolines. High cost, but you get what you pay for.
pros: Arched leg construction provides more stability

customer_reviews.title: Beware of warranty!
customer_reviews.text: We liked this a lot. I was so glad not to hear the springs squeaking or the popping sound they made when they broke, but the warranty is not what you may think. It says that the bungees are under warranty for two years, but that's for manufacturer defects -- not use. I didn't buy it for show. My barely 100 lb. daughter uses it a couple of time a week and I just noticed that many of the cords fell apart. So if you use it and it falls apart, that's not covered.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: No REAL warranty!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It says the cords are covered for 2 years but if they break because you've been using it (as opposed to buying it and looking at it for 6 months) then that is considered use and not a defect so no replacement. I bought this in November, managed to get it set up in February and have been using it consistently since then. In less than 6 months at least a third of the bands are broken and it is not covered. Do NOT waste your money. This thing is a money pit wrapped in a pretty (fake) warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kirkley

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought lasted about 4 years before wearing out. The second one is breaking down after a little over 1 year; which makes this item even pricey-er to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legs get really loose and fell off  after less than one year of non regular use.
customer_reviews.text: I use it 4-6 times a week and its a nice piece of equipment to get the lymph fluid pumping. However less than one year of use, two of the legs start getting very loose and one of the legs literally fell off. I would expect a piece cost me $249 would last more than one year. As the rebounder was actually in storage for 5.5 months. I only use this for 5 months of about 5 times a week. I eastimate I use it100 times and an average of 15 minutes per session. So it breaks after 1500 minutes of use. Its totally unacceptable!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: It smells like tires...
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh! It smells like a tire factory in my home now. I'm returning it ASAP because the offgassing is awful.
customer_reviews.author: CarolP913

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two and one is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've spent countless hours on the rebounder and I absolutely love it! We own two, one in each of our homes! I gave it 4 stars because the second one was shipped to our second home (where we spend very little time.) I realized that the bumpers were sewn on wrong and that's become a bit of a safety issue (catching my feet and all) as I'm actually using this one now. Probably too late to call the company but word of advice ... Check your delivery and Don't settle if it's not absolutely perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great until it wasn’t
customer_reviews.text: My 90-100 lb daughter used this trampoline multiple times a day for 3 years. The bungees failed first, within a year. We replaced those. Then the mat developed a hole. JumpSport replaced that. Now today there was a major structural failure. Two of the legs tore away from the hoop. See pictures. We liked this trampoline, it was quiet and there were not any springs to pinch fingers. It was a nice activity for my daughter to enjoy but, this last failure was too much. My daughter was slightly injured during this last breakage. Thankfully, she did not break any bones.
customer_reviews.author: jpender

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. My daughters used 6 months cords broke, frayed. Useless
customer_reviews.author: m mann

customer_reviews.title: Soft bounce and quiet. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. Only had to screw in the legs and start rebounding. Absolutely love the soft feel of the bounce. Not as stiff as the ones with springs. I first bought the Cellerciser, which costs twice as much as this one, and had to return it because the bounce was so stiff it was killing my back. Almost gave up completely on getting another one after the Cellerciser but decided to try this bungee cord one. So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: L. Libla

customer_reviews.title: Did not Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 3 months ago. It was supposed to be a heavy duty product. Last night one of the straps unraveled where it is attached to the mat and came undone. Now it is useless and the rest of the straps now started unraveling too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly had me bouncing within ten minutes of unboxing
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if previous models were different but the one I received couldn’t have been easier to install. Seriously the hardest part was getting the tape off that kept the pieces secure. The legs came tucked inside the bungee springs, wrapped in bubble wrap. Flip the rebounder over and it’s just a few turn of the provided hex bolt to secure each leg into place. I was bouncing within ten minutes of unboxing. Your lymphatic system will thank you for even just five minutes of rebounding daily. JUMPSPORT: I do wish the $25 off deal from your website had been extended to the prices on Amazon as well. My coupon sat unused in my inbox.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! I have it situated right in front of my TV so that I can work out while being entertained. I am a beginner at rebounding so take frequent breaks only because I can feel my muscles at work and have to get used to this workout, as well as I am working on my coordination so that I can keep up with the videos. My sister has the Urban Rebounder and the experience is not the same; she is often using mine because it's quieter and the bounce is smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Received it today! The bounce is out of this world! During the agonizing wait period I kept wondering "should I have made this kind of investment"? I already have a mini trampoline. I was so embarrassed I had it delivered at work so my hubby would not talk about me! But you know what... the bounce is out of this world..., so different than the spring action. Am I worth $249.00? You darn tooting I am! So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Love rebounding, wish I had a better quality product ...
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that most people don't really get a lot of use out of exercise equipment so they probably rate this well for as long as they really use it. That being said - I had two of the cords on this thing break within 6 months. I used it a lot! But still for the price I really think it should have lasted longer. The stitching came away from the plastic pieces that hold the bungee cords. Not returnable to Amazon so I'm irritated. I'm not obese or anything, I use this thing for about an hour or so 5 - 7 times a week, Love rebounding, wish I had a better quality product is all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for families
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to find the right rebounder. For me, it needed to be big enough to not accidentally fall off, good for lymph drainage, quiet and something my 4 kids would not destroy quickly. We love this rebounder. It is very quiet and has held up to the whole family bouncing on it for the last 5 or so months. It is super sturdy, easy to assemble and fun! I haven’t tried the exercise video yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Love this trampoline
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this amount of money on a mini trampoline, but I also knew I wanted something durable. The thought of unfolding a spring loaded trampoline was terrifying to me so that's another reason I liked this one. I've used it everyday for almost 2 months now and it's like day one. Sturdy, springy, no signs of the bungies getting weak. An added benefit is I'm losing weight in a fun, jumpy kind of way!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: What a great rebounder!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rebounder!! I've upped my activity by a lot. I jump onto it many times a day when I have a few minutes of extra time. I can already feel the benefits after just a week. I have been having a lot of arthritis pain this year, and that is considerably lessened. I'm moving more easily. It's great quality, it's quiet, it's easy, and it's FUN!!
customer_reviews.author: Stitchingmom

customer_reviews.title: Was indecisive between 250 & 350 glad I kept it
customer_reviews.text: I saw lots of videos and decided to buy the 250. As soon as I ordered it, I wanted the 350 because was scared the 250 would make noises because people call the 350 “the silent one”. But I waited for the package to come. When I tried it, the 250 is perfectly silent! Live it
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Spend More on a better quality rebounder - this one wasn’t worth it
customer_reviews.text: Springs fell apart within months!! We feel like this was a really crappy purchase in spite of our due diligence. Should have bought the more expensive one. Had to buy a box of 30 replacement springs direct from the manufacturer - they wouldn’t sell through Amazon - and it wasn’t cheap. It was 30 or none. And their customer service was BRUTAL.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb C.

customer_reviews.title: Great. Just make sure to screw legs in well, takes awhile..
customer_reviews.text: Basically best thing ever. I figured it out, its important to screw hard, until the leg stops wiggling. Now its secure and i can't get off of it its so fun. Not returning. It's great. Edit: the legs were giggly because i didn't see thr provided special extension and wrench and was doing it wrong. The directions said nothing about thr provided wrench or that it was even provided. Annoying. Returning. Maybe im doing something wrong but all the legs are wiggly and loose after I tightened them with a 6mm wrench. Why?! Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kim

customer_reviews.title: Effective exercise
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived undamaged. Easy to put the legs on. For my size and the size I purchased, it's a good amount of space to rebound on. So far, I find working out on it is easy and with zero impact issues. Joints and body feel good afterward. I do wish though that there were more streaming videos through the product's site. Though, I have not done a lot of research on the product's site so far on all streaming videos offered, so my opinion on this may change. Overall a safe and effective method of exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: JumpSport 250
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the JumpSport 250 after doing quite a bit of research. Even though there are less expensive options, we went with the JumpSport 250. We couldn't be more pleased with our purchase. Very high quality, shipped fast, easy to attach the legs, and it is nice that the bands have a protective cover to keep us from slipping thru while bouncing. I would highly recommend buying this brand if you are looking for a high quality trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Jake34

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel like a kid again
customer_reviews.text: I love this! We added it to our home gym and then at my office! It brings a smile to your face, wakes your up, is the perfect warm up, and is a talking piece whenever we have people over. Who says you cant jump on a trampoline once you're an adult? BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for the past year and am really pleased with it. Easy to put together and holds up well. I use it to exercise on while I watch TV since I can no longer run (bad knees). Compared to other trampolines with metal springs, this is quiet. Doesn’t take up a lot of room - I roll it into my guest room closet (with the legs on it) when done and it fits behind the door. Just wish I could find more videos of trampoline exercises on-line. Good price, good quality product and really enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and genius design
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a spring version trampoline before and several springs eventually broke. They were also difficult to work with in terms of replacing them. This system is genius in that they use bungie instead of springs. The design for replacing them is also incredibly simple. Highly recommend paying a little extra for this level of quality. Overall it feels like a gym/commercial quality piece of equipment. The powder coating is also really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: The straps are weak and break quickly with regular use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trampoline for my 12 year old daughter, after 5 months of use so many of the straps have broken that it is now useless! She is a normal size girl! No warranty is terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Neil W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Really a high quality, easy to assemble product!!! I had a cheap spring rebounder that I thought was good enough. I have bad knees and the JumpSport 250 made it much less stress on them for sure. I flinched at the cost but really think it's worth it. My girlfriend loves hers too. Young or old find one like this that is easier on your joints!
customer_reviews.author: djcali

customer_reviews.title: storage
customer_reviews.text: I have not had it very long, which is why I only gave 4 stars. To soon to know how durable it will be. Wasn't hard to put together. It comes with the bungees on the least resistive setting. I realized it "gave" to much, but changing it to a medium resistance was not hard to do. It stores well in my closet when not in use. It is a little cumbersome to move around from one room to the next, but it is not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Kibler

customer_reviews.title: Really love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great soft bounce and very sturdy and quiet, nicely made piece of equipment, and fun to use! Glad I opted for the "petal" flaps that cover the bungee cords because you can safely jump on them and if gives you some extra surface space. Very easy to set up and light weight to move around.
customer_reviews.author: CindyW HB

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for health
customer_reviews.text: This is quite heavy for me to carry it from concierge to my apartment. Nonetheless, the ease of setting up made up for it. I feel comfortable enough, looking at how it was designed and built to start using right away. It was really fun and helpful to get moving, take breaks from working too much in front of the computer. I highly recommend it to get the lymph moving as well. In just a few days, I feel much better and fitter. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lay

customer_reviews.title: Great for running in place and other "bounce" work.
customer_reviews.text: I got this and I also purchased the bar to hold on to. I have hardware in one leg and this lets me run in place with no jolting or pain. I can also just bounce, gently without hurting my leg. I'm over 65... and am glad to have something like this to exercise on when it's too cold outside for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Mommu

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Well designed!
customer_reviews.text: I've had other far less expensive small exercise trampolines, but none that compare to the beautiful design and enjoyable performance of this product. It is so quiet to use and works so well. I've had many people and family try it out, and not only does everyone get a big smile from how well it works, but people often note how far superior and quieter it is compare to many other similar products. We are very pleased and would highly recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Art B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stable, quiet, responsive rebounding surface
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to a treadmill. I use light hand-weights with it, and I jog in place, and do a variety of movements. Great cardio. Great for ankles and whole body strengthening and stability. Easy on my knees which tend to hurt after running on pavement. I didn't get the folding style, but the amount of space needed for this is trivial compared to a treadmill, and far less costly. The stretchiness of the bands creates a smooth, evenly stretching surface, more gentle than the cheap metal spring type of rebounder, which I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: Opally

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST indoor trampoline hands down
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST indoor trampoline hands down! My young son loves to jump at least and 1 1/2 a day. I used to go through a trampoline every month month and half until I discovered JumpSport. It felt expensive when I first ordered it, but was worth every penny! Had an issue with the tabs ripping from the mat and the customer service was EXCEPTIONAL! The warranty is the best and they took care of everything within two days and a total of four days to have the parts sent to my house. I can't say enough great things about the product and the company itself. Don't even hesitate to order from JumpSport. They're the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Now, it is very rare for me to give any product 5 stars but this trampoline blow me away! Me and my wife and the kids cant stop using it. it is fun, strong, and you burn calories without hurting your knees, which is great if you have knees issues like myself. Still waiting to see if I will actually loose weight, but even if not I am still happy I got it I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: A nice starter rebounder.
customer_reviews.text: It did the trick for awhile, but I graduated to a Bellicon. This was too bouncy for me, but I was still able to get a relatively decent workout. Not great for HIIT. You will want a firmer bungee for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: I'm on my second mat its been only 8 months ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second mat its been only 8 months going to have to order again in a couple more months.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It has a bigger bounce area than I expected. The "bounce" is just right, soft but not too much. Easy to put legs on and I think the curved legs give it more stability. It doesn't "move" when I bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Wheeeeeee......  Might as well JUMP......
customer_reviews.text: Adults love it, kids love it! This thing is just awesome. Just be warned... you can really fly high in this thing and launch yourself. :-) It's quiet, it's durable, lightweight, but a bit larger / taller than the standard typical spring style mini-trampolines seen most places. If you are in the market for a mini trampoline, I'd recommend that you just make the investment on this. It's going to outlast the cheap ones and be way more fun... if you're going to use it indoors, it's actually going to be quiet enough to use around other people.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Is Free

customer_reviews.title: Fun and effective
customer_reviews.text: We have been using our new JumpSport Trampoline model 250 for two weeks now. My husband and I both really love it and use it everyday. It is very well built and sturdy, and bounding on it is so effective an exercise for our legs. Different from many other exercise, it is fun and allow us to behavior like a child again! So we can get sweaty without feeling working hard. I expect to enjoy it more especially when the winter is here and we cannot go out walking and jogging anymore. I do hope its surface can be slightly bigger as we need to be cautious when doing jumping jacks. Anyway, a great investment in our health. Strongly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: N. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great little trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Great little trampoline. We are switching over from a metal-spring trampoline. What a difference! It is much more fun. It is also quieter and easier on the joints!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Von

customer_reviews.title: I love to Rebound
customer_reviews.text: I compared on an independent site, many of the top brand rebounders. This one is the best quality and best price. Love it. Love to rebound. Has a deep bounce, large bounce surface and great for folks up to 275 pounds. This works SUPER for my 120 pound weigh. Get a good, deep bounce and am able to do a complete 180 turn-around bounce, which stimulate your eyes to improve better vision.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Doty

customer_reviews.title: Review by a 7yo kid!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble very bouncy fun for all ages my mom can bounce on it very sturdy when we first got it it didn’t feel bouncy enough for kids but after a while it was bouncy! Overall a great experience for me and my family
customer_reviews.author: The Professor, Ann Marian

customer_reviews.title: Great no impact exercise
customer_reviews.text: I love that this uses bungees instead of springs so it’s quiet and less jerky. I have issues with my ankle so I can’t run anymore. This is a great no impact workout that doesn’t hurt my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Best Decision Ever
customer_reviews.text: I can jog for hours on this with no knee pain. Also fun to just jump away the stress of the day. Lots of exercise possibilities. Helping with weight loss and overall strengthening. Only had to attach the legs (took 10 minutes) before it was ready to go. Highly recommend buying the extra hand rail attachment to aid in balance. Overall I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that has held up well and feels really durable. At first, I purchased a cheaper trampoline and within a month two of the springs broke. The seller (not Amazon) would not do anything for me and the manufacturer replied with a "we'll get back to you" email. This product is of much higher quality than my first trampoline, has a nice even bounce and comes with a DVD that shows a variety of exercises. I weigh nearly 200 lbs, so I needed something very durable. So far this feels like its going to hold up...plus it has a longer warranty than most other offerings.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Green

customer_reviews.title: You really should buy the stability bar with it
customer_reviews.text: As my son assembled this he told me I should have gotten the stability bar. He was right. It's not like jumping on a trampoline because of the smaller surface. It will take getting used to as I try to stay in the center. I will, for safety's sake, eventually purchase the bar. I was cheap and didn't want to spend anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline for everyday use at home
customer_reviews.text: I debated joining a gym again this year and instead decided to purchase this trampoline. It's really quite nice and works well and it's very sturdy and has great stability. I think I will get years of use out of it. I only wish the trampoline had more jumping surface as you are really limited as what you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. The plastic has sharp edges that cut right through the straps that are stitched in to hold it. I only jumped for 2 minutes before it stated to fall apart. The sad part is they only have to file the sharp plastic edges befor assembly and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with the Jump Sport 250! I enjoy using it with the 30 minute DVD which comes with it. I did order a handlebar for it just to be more secure with balance. The size is perfect for our small house yet is large enough to give the benefits of a full workout. Excellent quality and not at all noisy. And it is a FUN way to add more variety to your exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this rebounder.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this rebounder. It is quiet when using it. I think my muscle tone & circulation has improved. I try to jump 3-5 minutes 3x a day. It is quick way to get your circulation moving after sitting for awhile. My grandkids love it. I’m glad I ordered the balance bar with it. I don’t think my balance is too good so I feel safer using the bar. I 4 stars because one of the small plastic rings go where the balance bar attaches on the side was broken when I received it. I notified the company but haven’t received a replacement ring. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sheree c.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & solid
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long enough to really review but so far its appears to ve made of quality material, not cheap @ all Its quiet i dont have worry about ppl underneath me , very easy to assemble. This company brand seem dedicated in putting out the best product for best results ...
customer_reviews.author: kimm

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trampoline! No springs - no squeaks! It's so quiet, I jump while watching television at a normal volume. Comfortable bounce, with/without shoes. No jarring of my joints. Construction is sturdy and I put it together in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved exercising using a mini trampoline
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved exercising using a mini trampoline. I never cared for the ones with springs though because when they broke, that was it. Well, this one is worth every penny. The jumps are smooth and comfy. I like the height from the ground as well. My favorite part is that there are no springs to break on it. It's made so strongly that I can't imagine how long it will last using it 3 times a week for 30 minutes a time. Love it and would buy it again. Oh, love that I only had to screw in legs and didn't have to wrestle it to get unfolded!
customer_reviews.author: faye thompson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware- do not buy from VM Express
customer_reviews.text: The bungee springs broke after just 2 months since purchasing it. I contacted the seller (VM Express) and they won’t help me since it is past 30 day return policy. This is very unfair!
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: Jumpsport Fitness Trampoline Model 250
customer_reviews.text: Impressive construction and made in the USA. The tension on the surface is easily adjustable which is great, and the trampoline is very stable. I was hesitant to purchase at first due to the price, but after receiving the unit am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Really high quality. We use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this trampoline. (The first one lasted through a bajillion jumps over several years like a champ.). We loooove it. My daughter has anxiety and my son has autism, so this bad boy gets a ton of usage. It’s fantastic. Super bouncy. And really secure. One of our best purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rebounder. It's very well constructed and durable, and the bounce is neither too stiff nor too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Safe Haven

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this one for anyone great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Different one last summer that folds up and it is made so cheaply. This one seems to be manufactured very well, quite sturdy, and I’ve jumped pretty hard on it and never had any issues yet. I would highly recommend this one for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Mallette

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE it! The bounce is just right. If you ever change the design, could I suggest that you make it a few inches shorter, so we seniors can get on it a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn L. Brainerd

customer_reviews.title: No buyers remorse here. Its a lot easier on ...
customer_reviews.text: No buyers remorse here. Its a lot easier on my knees than running uphill to my mailbox. I am more toned up and lost a few pounds in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is the best trampoline I have owned...My son(12 yr old) and I (43yr young) LOVE it and use daily, a great way to start the day, great for lymph flow, and to boost you mood...This is SO worth every penny and very sturdy, I have had for about 2 years now... I did loose the thingy,( I forget what it is called) to tighten the bolts but has held up TREMENDOUSLY , especially over those cheap $30-$60 trampolines that REAK of chemicals from the plastic covers, not to mention dangerous and fall apart quick. THIS is definitely worth the investment for the body, mind and spirit =) BE WELL
customer_reviews.author: Cacaogirl

customer_reviews.title: Better than walking in the snow!
customer_reviews.text: Great excercise for rehabbing my foot. I used a trampoline in the physical therapists' office. I decided to get my own since our winter this year was never ending. I did a lot of research and chose the Model 250 JumpSport. It's perfect for my needs, quiet and fun to use while I strengthen my foot and improve my balance. I put it together easily. I debated whether to get the handle but placed it a short distance behind the back of the couch in case I needed to grab it for balance.
customer_reviews.author: retired teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It was very easy to assemble the legs as that’s all that was needed. It is sturdy and I weigh close to 200lbs. It’s light enough to move from place to place and you can stand it on its side to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reliable
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended and it was so on point! I use it daily and is very stable and strong. Use for the lymphatic system detox. I totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Started out with a cheapie to know that I want a rebounder. Checking out a friend's $400 model, wasn't ready to spend that much but could tell it was much better quality. This model was the perfect in-between: great quality but more affordable. Once set up (just screwing in the legs) the higher stand on much sturdier legs, the wider mat size, the video that comes with: all added up to better quality and feel. Perfect for the coming winter. . . !
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: There are so many rebounders out there, I just got lucky that I picked this one. Very well made and worth every penny. What I like the most is how quiet it is. I can use it while others are in the room and they don't even notice me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described - our ASD son uses it everyday sometimes while watching TV. Maybe we should've gotten tha foldable one but we put our beanbag on top of it to indicate no jomping so my son uses it to watch tv on his stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Army Mom 2018

customer_reviews.title: Strong, good quality trampoline.
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but worth the money if you want a low level cardio. Jog on mine 7 days weekly, about 1 and 1/2 hours each workout.
customer_reviews.author: thomas yelich

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I do wish the legs folded but ...
customer_reviews.text: The bands are a bit loose but ok for someone my weight (140). Someone of greater weight might need one with tighter bands. Otherwise, I love it! I do wish the legs folded but those are a higher price usually. I never thought I would get so out of breath from jumping around but it's a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: rene

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! I'm a Jillian Michaels workout fan, but my knees won't let me do a lot of her higher impact exercises so I bought this fitness trampoline. It is perfect! I can't believe that I still get an awesome workout without my joints killing me. My kids love it too...sometimes it's hard to convince them to give me a turn!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun Exercise
customer_reviews.text: I just got this baby today! I spent a good 45-50 minutes jumping and it was SO fun! I actually ended up sweating a bit and felt like a kid again. I love it so far and I hope it lasts for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: High quality trampoline
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to jump on when I was feeling tired throughout the day, like Tony Robbins does. It is a high quality trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trampoline for my son to bounce on while he plays video games.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trampoline for my use
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and his friends love this! However, I didn't buy it for them - I bought it for myself (and I love it, too!). The size is perfect for my apartment, and it's very quiet - which is important because I live in an upstairs apartment above an elderly gentleman. The 'bounce' is easy on my joints and I feel like I've gotten a pretty good workout after just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Everyone in my family wants one now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trampoline so much I bought one for my parents! Great workout with no impact, and easy to store. Best bounce/tension I've experienced on a fitness trampoline. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for all of your trampoline reviews, so I could make a wise choice.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the Jump Sport. After reading all of the reviews on other brands and models, I chose this medium-priced trampoline, rather than, as many others complained about, choosing a cheaper brand, regretting it, and upgrading anyway. The bungie connections are very quiet. I ordered the "handlebar", too, so I'm well-equipped for training.
customer_reviews.author: ViolaJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble - took about 10 minutes to get out of box and bolt on the 4 legs. Product is made of high quality materials and is very sturdy. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Gaikwad

customer_reviews.title: Too fun to be a workout.
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun it makes workouts feel like half their duration. Proper form is ESSENTIAL as the first few times it hurt my lower back, but that’s on me. The product itself is very sturdy and well made. I love this new addition to my home gym!
customer_reviews.author: Emmett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this trampoline its very good quality. I would have to say that sometimes it hard to keep your self balanced. so maybe a bar is good to have if you want. i dont know if this model has a bar. the bounce is amazing. better than my cheap one. Its kind of tall so again watch your balance. lastly, its just me or maybe some people but seeing that the cords are visible its kinda scary and my brain tricks me into thinking it might break but most likeley it wont. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and sturdy product, easy assembly. Couldn't keep due to a knee injury. Will order in the future when fully healed. Thank you for making my return a smooth transaction!
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Trampoline
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trampoline for indoor exercise during the quarantine. It was easy to assemble. My children and I use it all the time. It is money well spent and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary ramon

customer_reviews.title: I can go on it easily, and is would support more than my weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son w Autism loves this. He wore out a cheaper one from a kids/toy catalog. This is INDESTRUCTABLE! Very quality construction. I can go on it easily, and is would support more than my weight ( 6'0", 195lbs man). lots of fun, good exercise. The handle is great, esp for kids.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Have had mine for several years and got one for my dad and he loves it with the stabilizer bar.
customer_reviews.author: hh

customer_reviews.title: I've bounced on it and enjoy it; great exercise and no sound from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife who loves it. I've bounced on it and enjoy it; great exercise and no sound from the bands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: have a spring bounder this jumpsport day and night better more comfortable, more action less harsh love it quality extremely high
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mann

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I work at home and sit a lot. This has been a fun way to exercise. I get up every half hour and exercise on the tramp. It is not large and nice looking. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Jarring
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. My husband and I find it a bit jarring to jump on it. I wanted to love it because I've read all the positive reviews. I bounced on it for twenty minutes yesterday and afterwards I got a headache. This has happened almost every time I've jumped. My husband gets them after jumping as well. The base of the jumping area is very small. It's a start in the right direction but I think there is one that's more expensive and seems to have a larger base area for jumping and it doesn't have that "stiff" feel to it. I will keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: I love this trampoline
customer_reviews.text: I love this trampoline. I am able to workout without creating much house vibration or noise. YouTube has some great workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month or so ago. It is very sturdy and was easy to assemble. good quality and should last for years. I use it often. I often bounce while I watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: I do not regret buying this.
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth with all the different models before finally realizing the smaller one would be better for my nyc apartment. It is a lot of fun to use and I enjoy bouncing on it when I am bored. I am very happy going with the smallest cheapest model. It seems very well made. I am really happy I just went for it and bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Tor

customer_reviews.title: Helps joints and circulation
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy design. Bungee cords are secure and it's nice knowing there is no risk of a spring flying. The unit does not move when in use. Really helps my joints and circulation.
customer_reviews.author: jamesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Was looking for an alternative to walking if we have another winter in Ohio like the last one. This is a great cardio workout and a lot of fun. There are a lot of workout videos on line to take advantage of. You can go easy or all out depending on the type of workout you want. It's quiet and stays in place well. Very sturdy but not so heavy that it can't be easily moved. Very stable if set up on its side for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: college mom

customer_reviews.title: It's Like Jumping on a Cloud
customer_reviews.text: We just upgraded to the JumpSport from our old basic spring-powered cheap rebounder. Wow, what a difference! It has made rebounding fun again. There really is a difference between a rebounder with springs and a rebounder with bungees. It's quiet, and smooth as butter.
customer_reviews.author: JustMyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: This is a super comfortable mini trampoline to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a super comfortable mini trampoline to use. It is worth the money. It is sturdy and well made. I am happy with my purchase and have been using it regularly. It is an easy way to get aerobic exercise that is low impact and I hear its great for your lymph system.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Bounce like it's 1999
customer_reviews.text: Great quality item, fun and gets the heart rate up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Clinton

customer_reviews.title: It is what they say it is
customer_reviews.text: Love my JumpSport Rebounder. I feel safe on it; its very sturdy and it's so much fun, it makes me feel like a kid again. Great product and great support with videos on their site showing you how to do exercise routines.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Miller-Young

customer_reviews.title: Love this!  Now I can trick myself into exercising :)
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality and was easy to assemble. The legs needed attached with the provided allen wrench which was very easy. It is sturdy and high quality. Perfect size for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sechrist

customer_reviews.title: Found a solution for a solid workout at home
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my rebounder for over a month on most days and find it's what I need to get aerobic exercise. With chronic ankle and foot arthritis, I'm limited in how I exercise, so it's my go-to solution for days I don't go to the gym. Also, the handle is a really secure support and useful for balance work and weight training.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee Cole

customer_reviews.title: The best rebounder!!
customer_reviews.text: Freaking awesome. Eons better than 100 dollar units!!! I weigh 250 and it feels great to bounce. I purchased a stabilizer bar too
customer_reviews.author: jillery!!!

product_meta.title: JumpSport 250 In Home Cardio Fitness Rebounder - Durable Silent Bounce Mini Trampoline with Premium Bungees, Workout DVD, and Online Access to Video Workouts - Safe and Stable
product_meta.description: THE CHOICE OF PROFESSIONAL FITNESS INSTRUCTORS and gyms across the world for higher intensity workouts. See the mini trampoline commercial classes videos! ALMOST FULLY ASSEMBLED! Be bouncing within minutes of opening the box. Just attach the easy-on legs and go. BUILT EXTRA TOUGH with our strongest frame for the rigors of group fitness and personal training, as seen in gyms everywhere, providing a roomy safe exercise platform. PATENTED PADDED PETAL SKIRT COMFORTABLY EXPANDS WORKOUT AREA whether standing, sitting or reclining. The 250 comes with our exclusive Padded Petal Skirt which moves with your bounce and provides a larger more comfortable surface for varied exercises like abdominal and leg lift work. NO-TIP PATENTED ARCHED LEGS lets you safely jump with stability and confidence. Frame is sealed and protected with a tough, durable 2-coat, striking black finish for lasting durability. These technologies combine for our smoothest, most cushioned, exhilarating bounce helping you feel buoyant and happy! CYCLE-TESTED TO HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF BOUNCES. You get 30 of our premium (8mm) EnduroLast 2 cords cycle-tested to 400 thousand bounces, 3× to 4× longer life than all competitive products. NO SQUEAK SILENT BOUNCING! The virtually silent bounce allows you to use this anytime, day or night. Maximum user weight rating of 225 pounds. WARRANTY – Residential Use: Steel Frame & Legs – Lifetime, Mat & EnduroLast 2 Elastic Cords – 2 years, All Other Components – 1 year JUMPSPORT IS A SMALL, USA, FAMILY-OWNED, 20 YEAR-OLD BUSINESS. Our founder, Mark Publicover, known as The Father of Trampoline Safety, is the inventor of the trampoline safety enclosure that protects millions of bouncing kids around the world every day. JumpSport is the industry-leading innovator in trampolines. Feel good about buying the highest quality products available. INCLUDES EXCLUSIVE EXERCISE DVD.
feature_bullets: Unique Design: Fitness trampoline designed to provide a comfortable, quiet level of bounce for all ages and condition levels. Has a 40% reduction in impact as opposed to traditional bouncers
Large Padded Edges: Features a large jumping surface and extra-wide padded mat making it great for low impact cardio, core exercises, high-calorie burns, lymphatic flow, and so much more

Sturdy & Stable: Designed with a black powder-coated 39-inch frame with a 35. 5-inch Permatron jumping surface. With arched legs providing aditional stability, resist tipping, and make for easy storage. With a weight rating of 250 pounds

Premium Bungees: EnduroLast 2 elastic cords are tested to millions of bounces and give users a lively but cushioned bounce. Has the virtually silent FlexBounce System which is a gentle and smooth bounce in comparison to steel springs

Package Includes: Free 60-Day Extended Trial to online workout videos, JumpSport basic DVD, and the trampoline which comes almost fully assembled to get you bouncing quickly and easily. Additional accessories like the handle bar not included.
